title: Textile, 1920–30
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: Block print on plain weave
description: Polychrome block print on natural linen. Serpentine branches patterned in squares either blue or green, with three exotic birds, -  brown with yellow, green, and red and blue feathers sitting on branches. Fantasitc fruits and flowers grow on branches; on one flower each petal is patterned by stylized flowering plants in red, yellow, blue, and green, - red lily, yellow tulip, yellow and red artichoke, red cherries, yellow pomegranates, etc. Pattern repeats side to side. Condition: Soiled.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920–30.
1920–30. Medium: linen
Technique: Block print on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-49.
